description: The WorldCereal maize products provide binary maps for the maize growing seasons as defined by the WorldCereal global crop calendars, showing where maize is grown. The WorldCereal maize products were generated within the respective annual temporary crops mask.
title: ESA WorldCereal products for maize per agro-ecological zone - V1
license: ESA WorldCereals products are available on a free basis for the general public under the terms and conditions of the Licence found at https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/. The products contain modified Copernicus Sentinel data see https://sentinel.esa.int/documents/247904/690755/Sentinel_Data_Legal_Notice
